column5: Hello anyone been down to Hay Bay . I am going down this coming week end. And I am looking for any fish reports I can find out there. It's been about eight years since I was there last. And I always went around the MAY long weekend. So its all new to me this time of year. What kind of fishing can I expect this time of year.   THANKS .
I saw a report last week that a group did well with resident walleye. Just trolled the shorelines out in the reach.
Check out the Quinte forums...  Seem a few are still doing well in the big bay..
I did well down at Malorey point .
